Napier’s McLean Park not ready for club rugby finals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napiers-mclean-park-not-ready-for-club-rugby-finals/QRSUZBUD2JAIPNLEY5DNPGLQBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napiers-mclean-park-not-ready-for-club-rugby-finals/QRSUZBUD2JAIPNLEY5DNPGLQBM/ Doug LaingFour club rugby finals have been kicked out of the park.
